verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329><s%> Musician, <S%H5329><s%> A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%> O lord, <S%H3068><s%> you have searched <S%H2713><s%> me, and known <S%H3045><s%> me.
You know <S%H3045><s%> my sitting down <S%H3427><s%> and my rising up, <S%H6965><s%> you understand <S%H995><s%> my thought <S%H7454><s%> afar <S%H7350><s%> off.
You compass <S%H2219><s%> my path <S%H734><s%> and my lying <S%H7252><s%> down, <S%H7252><s%> and are acquainted <S%H5532><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> my ways. <S%H1870><s%>
For there is not a word <S%H4405><s%> in my tongue, <S%H3956><s%> but, see, <S%H2005><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> you know <S%H3045><s%> it altogether. <S%H3605><s%>
You have beset <S%H6696><s%> me behind <S%H268><s%> and before, <S%H6924><s%> and laid <S%H7896><s%> your hand <S%H3709><s%> on me.
Such knowledge <S%H1847><s%> is too wonderful <S%H6383><s%> for me; it is high, <S%H7682><s%> I cannot <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3201><s%> attain to it.
Where <S%H575><s%> shall I go <S%H3212><s%> from your spirit? <S%H7307><s%> or where <S%H575><s%> shall I flee <S%H1272><s%> from your presence? <S%H6440><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> I ascend <S%H5927><s%> up into heaven, <S%H8064><s%> you are there: <S%H8033><s%> if I make <S%H3331><s%> my bed <S%H3331><s%> in hell, <S%H7585><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> you are there.
If I take <S%H5375><s%> the wings <S%H3671><s%> of the morning, <S%H7837><s%> and dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the uttermost <S%H319><s%> parts of the sea; <S%H3220><s%>
Even <S%H1571><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> shall your hand <S%H3027><s%> lead <S%H5148><s%> me, and your right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> shall hold <S%H270><s%> me.
If I say, <S%H559><s%> Surely <S%H389><s%> the darkness <S%H2822><s%> shall cover <S%H7779><s%> me; even the night <S%H3915><s%> shall be light <S%H216><s%> about <S%H1157><s%> me.

Yes, <S%H1571><s%> the darkness <S%H2822><s%> hides <S%H2821><s%> not from you; but the night <S%H3915><s%> shines <S%H215><s%> as the day: <S%H3117><s%> the darkness <S%H2825><s%> and the light <S%H219><s%> are both alike to you.
For you have possessed <S%H7069><s%> my reins: <S%H3629><s%> you have covered <S%H5526><s%> me in my mother's <S%H517><s%> womb. <S%H990><s%>

I will praise <S%H3034><s%> you; for I am fearfully <S%H3372><s%> and wonderfully <S%H6395><s%> made: marvelous <S%H6381><s%> are your works; <S%H4639><s%> and that my soul <S%H5315><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> right <S%H3966><s%> well.

My substance <S%H6108><s%> was not hid <S%H3582><s%> from you, when <S%H834><s%> I was made <S%H6213><s%> in secret, <S%H5643><s%> and curiously <S%H7551><s%> worked <S%H7551><s%> in the lowest <S%H8482><s%> parts of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Your eyes <S%H5869><s%> did see <S%H7200><s%> my substance, <S%H1564><s%> yet being imperfect; and in your book <S%H5612><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my members were written, <S%H3789><s%> which in continuance <S%H3117><s%> were fashioned, <S%H3335><s%> when as yet there was none <S%H3808><s%> <S%H259><s%> of them.
How <S%H4100><s%> precious <S%H3365><s%> also are your thoughts <S%H7454><s%> to me, O God! <S%H410><s%> how <S%H4100><s%> great <S%H6105><s%> is the sum <S%H7218><s%> of them!
If I should count <S%H5608><s%> them, they are more <S%H7235><s%> in number than the sand: <S%H2344><s%> when I awake, <S%H6974><s%> I am still <S%H5750><s%> with you.
Surely <S%H518><s%> you will slay <S%H6991><s%> the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> O God: <S%H433><s%> depart <S%H5493><s%> from me therefore, you bloody <S%H1818><s%> men. <S%H582><s%>
For they speak <S%H559><s%> against you wickedly, <S%H4209><s%> and your enemies <S%H6145><s%> take <S%H5375><s%> your name in vain. <S%H7723><s%>
Do not I hate <S%H8130><s%> them, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that hate <S%H8130><s%> you? and am not I grieved <S%H6962><s%> with those that rise <S%H8618><s%> up against you?
I hate <S%H8130><s%> them with perfect <S%H8503><s%> hatred: <S%H8135><s%> I count <S%H1961><s%> them my enemies. <S%H341><s%>
Search <S%H2713><s%> me, O God, <S%H410><s%> and know <S%H3045><s%> my heart: <S%H3824><s%> try <S%H974><s%> me, and know <S%H3045><s%> my thoughts: <S%H8312><s%>
And see <S%H7200><s%> if <S%H518><s%> there be any wicked <S%H6090><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> in me, and lead <S%H5148><s%> me in the way <S%H1870><s%> everlasting. <S%H5769><s%>
